article_title: Orthodox rabbis indicted in divorce shakedown scheme
article_text:
Active RNS subscribers and members can view this content by logging-in here.

TRENTON, N.J. (RNS) Four Orthodox rabbis implicated in a torture-for-hire operation were indicted Thursday (May 22).

article_metadata.news_keywords: Culture, Ethics, get, grand jury, indictment, Jewish divorce, Judaism, kidnapping, rabbis, torture
